title: Under-pressure Biogen aims to please restive investors with bigger, better board
author: Eric Sagonowsky
description: Biogen knows what it's like to confront rebellious investors. | Biogen has faced rebellious investors before. Ten years ago, it confronted a proxy fight with activist Carl Icahn that ended with two new directors on its board. So in a way, it's no surprise the biotech is expanding its board now, just a few weeks after an Alzheimer's drug flop wiped 30% off its market cap.
